thread.title: 15 Things You'll Only Understand If You Have Overprotective Parents
thread.title_full: 15 Things You'll Only Understand If You Have Overprotective Parents

author: Krista Torres
title: 15 Things You'll Only Understand If You Have Overprotective Parents
text:
View this image › 
CW ID: 10680958 2. And then ask why everyone else gets to go except you. View this image › 
20th Century Fox ID: 10681035 3. On the off chance they do let you go somewhere, it is always under certain conditions. View this image › 
NBC ID: 10615117 4. They always send you a series of questions. View this image › 
nenepotwilson / Via instagram.com ID: 10681086 5. And they have no problem calling ALL of your friends to ask where you are if you don’t immediately answer. View this image › 
NBC ID: 10615034 6. In fact, they are so paranoid, they sometimes lose their common sense. View this image › 
Twitter: @Jackie_Rick ID: 10614540 7. They don’t trust you to follow rules on your own. View this image › 
Twitter: @BumpedThis ID: 10614547 8. And they are always worried something will happen to you. View this image › 
Twitter: @loridan75 ID: 10615032 9. As a kid, you never did any activity without your helmet, gloves, and kneepads. View this image › 
nicole.wild / Via instagram.com ID: 10614597 10. And, if it was cold, you were always over bundled. View this image › 
enjoylipenny / Via instagram.com ID: 10614579 11. They make sure you wear plenty of sunscreen. View this image › 
brianmpauley / Via instagram.com ID: 10614913 12. The only technology your parents have (almost) figured out is how to track your location. View this image › 
Twitter: @katelyn_neg ID: 10614543 13. When you think about telling them something personal, they always do something that makes you change your mind. View this image › 
ABC ID: 10680835 14. No matter how old you get, they still tell you what to do. View this image › 
Walt Disney ID: 10623696 15. But, it’s okay because you know if anything ever happens to you, they will literally drop everything to be there for you. View this image › 
supernaturalgifs.tumblr.com ID: 10681052 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
